price: “Kuki ntagaragira uwandemye kandi iwe ari na ho (namwe) muzasubizwa?”
arabic: وَمَالِيَ لَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā liya lā aʿbudu alladhī faṭaranī wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
